yelp_reviews.author: Lucia C.
yelp_reviews.review: I'll say immediately that I'm not familiar with Woodrose. (I rated 'average' because I had to choose something.) I'm looking at reviews of apartments for older people. The reviews here are all negative, but I have also noticed that they all seem to have been written by the same person. Same syntax, vocabulary, and complaints. I hope that Yelp can look into this.
